channel.title: How do i add npcs to my server and make them stay in a certain spot?
channel.description: can sum1 tell me how to add a npc to 1 spot and make it stay there?

item.title: How do i add npcs to my server and make them stay in a certain spot?
item.dc:creator: @Mad_Man_Joe6 Mad Man Joe6
item.description:
@Mad_Man_Joe6 wrote:

Well, use notepad or whatever you personally prefer to use for any Txt. file.

Add that anywhere in your autospawn.cfg, as long as its on a new line.

But don’t forget to change the coords otherwise you’ll have a Santa standing in port phasmatys for no reason.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i add npcs to my server and make them stay in a certain spot?
item.dc:creator: @Mad_Man_Joe6 Mad Man Joe6
item.description:
@Mad_Man_Joe6 wrote:

Right, so what you would do is:

spawn = 1552	3692	3469	0	0	0	0	0	2	HOMESHOP santa rares

And just change your coordinates.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 21, 2008, 02:35:56 PM[/size][hr]The coordinates being “3692” and “3469”

item.source: How do i add npcs to my server and make them stay in a certain spot?

item.title: How do i add npcs to my server and make them stay in a certain spot?
item.dc:creator: @Mad_Man_Joe6 Mad Man Joe6
item.description:
@Mad_Man_Joe6 wrote:

Open Autospawn.cfg, put in the NPC ID, coordinates and name (Optional)

e.g.

spawn = 844	2681	3325	0	2686	3327	3318	2679	1	East Ardougne Essence Wizard

This shows what NPC it is (844), the X (2681) and Y (3325) coordinates and the range. Leave the ranges as 0 and
leave the last digit as 1 or 2, write the name so you know what it is later on, save and compile.

Read full topic
